description:
We are looking for self-motivated people with a passion for travel to work remotely from home. The ideal candidate should have great interpersonal and communication skills, is well organized, good with computers, has high attention for detail, likes to learn, is coachable, can multi-task, and is goal oriented.This role not only allows you to shine in a creative and exciting field but also offers an outstanding chance for personal growth, career advancement, and the potential to earn attractive commissions.

Description:

  • Research and recommend vacation destinations to clients
  • Plan and arrange tour packages, excursions, and activities
  • Prepare quotes and review with clients in order to close bookings
  • Create social media marketing posts and creative fliers
  • We offer mentorship and guidance to help you succeed in your role and create outstanding events for our clients
  • This is a remote position, providing you the flexibility to work from the comfort of your own home or any location with an internet connection. You can balance your work and personal life while delivering exceptional travel experiences to your clients
  • We believe that your dedication and expertise should be rewarded
  • we offer the highest commission rates in the travel industry, ensuring that your hard work is highly rewarded
  • This role offers more than a job; it's a chance to build your own travel planning business within our organization. This is a business opportunity in which with your dedication and hard work can shape your financial future and explore career advancement opportunities within our company
  • We're committed to your success. Our comprehensive training and ongoing support will equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in your role and grow your travel planning business
  • Provide outstanding customer service and attention to detail
  • Utilize time management skills in order to research, plan, and book vacation packages for clients
  • Participate in various marketing activities
  • Attend daily training and webinars
  • This is a business opportunity
  • Complete certification training curriculums and attain specialization certifications
  • Book online domestic and international travel packages including cruises, hotel, air, car, activities, and event tickets
  • Create itineraries and invoices
  • Follow-up with clients and prepare them for their travel event
  • No sales quota

Skills

  • The ideal candidate should have some or all of these skills:
  • Self-motivated
  • Organizational skills
  • Time Management
  • Customer Service
  • Good communication skills
  • Enjoys research
  • Good at problem solving
  • Goal oriented
  • Is comfortable working independently and can complete self-paced online training
  • Must have a computer or smartphone

Qualifications/Benefits:

  • No experience necessary
  • Training will be provided
  • Flexible schedules
  • Great commission
  • Remote position
  • Great travel perks
  • Internet required
  • Business opportunity
  • Computer or smartphone required
  • Must be 18 years or older
  • US resident
  • Fam Trips
  • Supportive team
